title: Breaking Bad
creator_credit: Diane Mercer, Bryan Cranston, Sam Catlin, Moira Walley-Beckett, Melissa Bernstein, John Shiban, Patty Lin, Robb Wilson King, Karen Moore, Stewart Lyons, Kathleen Detoro, Thomas Schnauz, George Mastras, Peter Gould, Gran Via Productions, High Bridge Entertainment and Sony Pictures Television
brief_description: When Walter White, a New Mexico chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with Stage III cancer and given a prognosis of only two years left to live. He becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness and an unrelenting desire to secure his family’s financial future at any cost as he enters the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.
